Tests

The tests directory contains all test files.

  • unit directory: contains all unit tests

    • test_process_congress_records.py: tests that process_congress_records.py webscrapes pdf files.

    • test_database_helpers.py: tests the database created in database_helpers.py.

    • test_state_enum.py: tests the State enumerated type

    • test_transaction_dataclass.py: tests the Transaction dataclass

    • test_district_dataclass.py: tests the District dataclass

    • test_representative_helpers.py: tests the representative helper functions

Test Process Congress Records Test

test_process_congress_records.py: tests that process_congress_records.py webscrapes pdf files.

This is a little test suite for process_congress_records.py

class tests.unit.test_process_congress_records.ProcessCongressRecordsGetPdf(methodName='runTest')

This test case is supposed to test the get_pdf() function from process_congress_records.py.

Test Database Helpers

test_database_helpers.py: tests the database created in database_helpers.py.

class tests.unit.test_database_helpers.CheckCompaniesAdvancedSearchTestCase(methodName='runTest')

This test case is meant to test the check_advanced_search method in the Database Helpers file.

test_empty_request_returns_false()

This test makes sure that an empty request results in the function returning false.

test_nonempty_request_returns_true()

This test makes sure that a nonempty request results in the function returning true.

class tests.unit.test_database_helpers.GetCompaniesBtwnYearsTestCase(methodName='runTest')

This test case is meant to test the get_companies_btwn_years method in the Database Helpers file.

test_get_request_returns_correct_num_companies()

This test makes sure that a request results in the every transaction being returned. Note a request will include a start and end date.

test_put_request_returns_correct_count_transactions()

Tests if the put request returns the correct number of transactions. Currently the database is only populated with a representative data subset. This test should be updated when the database is updated.
